body.description: Citrus Magic Solid Air Fresheners provide convenient and long-lasting odor control. Created with a unique formula, the solid air fresheners absorb odors and leave a clean, fresh scent in the air. Perfect for any room throughout the house including: basement, laundry room, and bathroom, pet areas, cars, closets, and more! Eliminate foul odors throughout your home like smoke, mildew, and mold. Enjoy all the popular scents and freshen your home with Citrus Magic Solid Air Fresheners. Citrus Magic strives to maintain the highest level of natural possible while still creating effective cleaning products for the home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Citrus Magic Citrus Magic began with it Natural Tropical Citrus Blend, non-aerosol spray. Understanding the need for safer products, Citrus Magic has worked to produce safe, naturally-based products, free from harsh chemicals, that effectively work at eliminating odors, freshening the air and maintaining a clean environment at home, at work, or even during travel. Citrus Magic Solid Air Freshener, Pure Linen Refresh your home with Citrus Magic Solid Air Fresheners. Created with a unique formula, remove stubborn odors from your home for up to six weeks. Citrus Magic Solid Air Fresheners are a special odor absorber that cleans the air without masking it. Add Citrus Magic Odor Absorbers to any room, basement, or pet areas. Citrus Magic strives to maintain the highest level of natural possible while still creating effective cleaning products for the home.

Naturally Refreshing and Effective Natural Cleaning Power Using a unique dual action formula that utilizes vegetable-based odor eliminators and baking soda, Citrus Magic Solid Air Fresheners magically absorb bad odors in tough places and freshen the air. A Green Choice Citrus Magic understands the need for safer products to use in your home. Citrus Magic Solid Air Fresheners are free of harsh chemicals. Choose the safer choice for your home and family with Citrus Magic. Long-lasting Odor Control Citrus Magic Solid Air Fresheners use a unique formula to absorb odors for long-lasting odor control. Try our air fresheners in your basement, closets, pet areas or in your car.

Find your favorite scent Citrus Magic offers a variety of different scents to leave your home smelling fresh and clean. Try any of our other fragrances including: Pure Linen, Fresh Citrus and Lavender.

Citrus Magic Natural Odor Eliminating Air Freshener Spray, Tropical Lemon Citrus Magic Odor Eliminating Soy Blend Candle Citrus Magic Home Accents Odor Neutralizing Gel Beads How it works Pure citrus oils stop odors on contact Renewable essential oils that neutralizes odors in your home Odor elimination and decorative design come together while neutralizing odors in your home

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These air fresheners are wonderful
reviews.reviewText: I live in a basement apartment and sometimes be common area outside my door can smell kind of funky. I place one of these outside my door and it makes the area smell very nice. They last long as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like these because they have a nice smell, but they’re not overpowering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mild scent with odor neutralizing properties
reviews.reviewText: I use the citrus scent near our litter box and in all our vehicles and they help neutralize the odors of foods and hockey gear. The scent is mild enough to not make me sneeze but powerful enough to make a difference!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for anywhere in house
reviews.reviewText: These air fresheners are great for any room in the house. I mainly use them for where the dog’s crate is located.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT smell like the spray
reviews.reviewText: I bought these, expecting to smell the same thing as the spray they have. These did not! They smell like a public bathroom, with very little citrus smell. They also had some type of residue on them. I threw them away immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT natural, sort of work
reviews.reviewText: I really feel these are falsely advertised. The fragrance used in them is NOT naturally derived. That being said, the fragrance is not totally overwhelming like, say a glade plug-in, would be. I found I was okay with the fragrance as long as I placed the air freshener somewhere up high, away from areas I usually occupy.But, if you are sensitive to synthetic fragrances please be aware that these contain them and steer clear.I think these do a decent job overall at eliminating odor- I've used them near the litter boxes and they definitely seem to help and last awhile.I've started using white vinegar mixed with a bit of naturally scented fabric softener to freshen the air and linens and have been having pretty good results with that. And I've started using charcoal pouches and cedar sachets near the litter box. I think, in the long run, I prefer to go all-natural and leave these air fresheners behind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the smell
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t nauseate me like most air fresheners. They don’t last that long though. But they are effective. I use them in my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I hide these in our Short Term Rental for a faint but very pleasant scent!
reviews.reviewText: Not overpowering, last a long time, soft faint scent! We so not use it to "cover-up" only to make the home smell fresh! It is a STR and besides looking great upon first entry of our guests, we also want it it appeal to their other sensesI am a Realtor and have also used this if a home has any odor that would turn a buyer off...if it smells it does not sell!
